response.original_title: 【深夜25時】終電逃し×相部屋NTR 結婚が決まってる女上司とWベッドの上で次の日までハメまくったホテル浮気 高橋しょう子
response.overview: I miss the last train when I'm drinking at the bar with my female boss. He suggested that he go to Mankitsu, but his boss, who was drunk, said that it would be cheap if he split the bill and that he would stay at the hotel. I thought that there was no mistake only for the female boss who is also a fiancé who is about to get married, but when I entered the hotel, there was only one W bed. The boss who sleeps next to me ignites from the temptation to "Hold me?"
response.title: She Missed Her Last Train Home And Now We’re Sharing A Room Together My Lady Boss Is Getting Set To Be Married Soon, And Now We’re Committing Infidelity Together On A Double Bed At A Hotel, Fucking Until The Break Of Dawn Shoko Takahashi
